Tapered Legs: Tapered leg which gives you the extra stability and sturdiness with style
Wood material: Engineered wood with laminate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It takes two people to assemble but it’s worthwhile
reviews.reviewText: I always read the reviews before I purchase anything, but I rarely post one of my own. I really liked the way this coffee table looked and needed something like it to finish off my living room. Previous reviewers noted the unpacking takes time because of all the cardboard, styrofoam and paper, and they were right. What’s important is there wasn’t a scratch or damage to be found. Everything was in perfect condition. All components were clearly labeled and all smaller parts separated into their own smaller packets, but kept together in one larger one. The instructions are absolutely the most clear and complete that I’ve ever come across- and I’ve assembled countless things in the past. Not only that, each step has both a link and QR code to scan if you need help, plus available customer service if necessary. It is truly impressive. They tell you it will take you 2 people and 60 minutes. It took us longer, but we were very careful and watching football at the same time. Anyway, I suppose you could do it alone, but an extra set of hands definitely helped. We are very happy with the table. It’s perfect for our room. I would definitely buy from this company again in the future. We highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This table was easy to put together (I think). I made my sister and friend do it :) it took the two of them about 25 minutes! No power tools needed. I love the storage underneath. It’s a cute table and I’ve never had issues with it! I’ve had it for over 6 months and it’s still up strong !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble, sturdy as expected. It looked a little dorky but kind of cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it but wish board lined up exactly
reviews.reviewText: This was pretty easy to put together with another person helping. It looks so nice and not cheap. The sliding doors ARE on both sides (front and back) which is what I tried to figure out when buying it in case you are wondering that as well. The only slight issue was that there is one board that doesn’t exactly line up with the top of the table making a very slight gap between the side and the top. It isn’t super noticeable as you can’t really see in picture (it’s the slight gap on the side with the books) but is just one thing I’d call out that to make it be perfect, it ideally would line up exactly. I’d say it was worth the price and I love the way it looks! The sliding doors are nice and work well! I love the storage and hidden storage offered in this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Coffee table with style & functionality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was looking for a coffee table that was stylish, had a good finish, and with some small storage facility to keep the remote hidden away. This product fit my needs perfectly, it has closed storage ( spacious) on both sides. Usually coffee tables with storage are heavy, but I found this table to be reasonably lightweight yet sturdy. The design is minimalistic & elegant. It fit my needs perfectly and I am very happy with this coffee table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Bought this coffee table to match the Ensley TV stand I got for my office a while back. Just like the TV stand, it’s a great value and looks really nice.As per usual from Mopio, the packaging was fantastic. Protected, organized, and well thought out. My coffee table arrived without any damage whatsoever. I’ve been on Amazon for about 10 years now, and they have some of the best packaging I’ve seen.The build quality is what I expected after already getting the TV stand, for the price you can’t beat the sturdiness and feel of this coffee table. All the pieces fit perfectly together, not sure what others are talking about. All in all, fantastic build quality that I expect will last me for years.Assembly is just okay, I’ve assembled a lot of this type of furniture for myself and others. I recommend just getting the most open and clutter free space in your home to assemble this is. It’s not hard, just a lot of pieces.Great stuff Mopio, will be ordering more from you guys soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable & Stylish Coffee Table
reviews.reviewText: I love this coffee table. The quality is GREAT for the price. I bought the matching TV stand and loved it so much I bought the coffee table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easier to build than I expected
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this one because the pictures looked understatedly elegant, and was not disappointed. The box is heavy, as all the pieces are pretty solid. Some reviews said the unpacking was messy…it was mostly styrofoam pieces but not too bad. It was difficult to slide the large pieces out; you kind of have to tear open the box to do that more easily. I couldn’t find the instructions — they were probably somewhere in the box, but not easily accessible even after I took out all pieces. However, you can find a pdf of the instructions on the Amazon page, which is what I used. Now I’m not great at building furniture, but these use some specific written steps and that helped—I never had any moments of confusion while building. You can build alone; though I’m sure a second pair of hands would help. I’m not handy and not strong and I was fine. Took me close to 2 hours with no breaks. As for tools, a screwdriver helped, and it comes with an Allen key. I saw some people used wood glue to hold the side pieces in; slamming them in and using the floor to press down did the job for me. The finished product looks great!
